website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option from a trustworthy brand that’s known for producing quality formulations backed by science.
pros: Quercetin dihydrate (the most bio-available form) is paired with bromelain for improved absorption
Third party tested for safety and quality
Lower per capsule dosage makes it easier to make gradual increases
Many users felt it significantly improved allergy symptoms while others reported a reduction in inflammation
cons: Some users experienced gastrointestinal discomfort when trying it out for the first time

customer_reviews.title: So many uses. But for me it helps my tummy big time.
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong anti-inflammatory and anti-swelling agent! Also helps... ACL tears Allergies Arthritis and joint pain Asthma Autoimmune diseases Cancer Inflammatory Bowel Disease Sinus infections Sprained ankles Tendonitis AND.... Inflammatory Bowel Disease Ulcerative Colitis Dyspepsia Colon Cancer Constipation Crohn’s Disease Because of its a natural anti-inflammatory it makes it a wonderful replacement to aspirin, which does a number on my stomach. I like to stay a mile away from aspirin. if you have tummy trouble like me I highly suggest this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P

customer_reviews.title: So many health benefits...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, I use it to combat allergies in my entire family and that's including the pets (you have to adjust the dosage to the weight of course) this is a much healthier alternative to the otc allergy meds that we have just built a tolerance to. I recommend researching online for your own peace of mind.

customer_reviews.title: thank you drs best. you formula

Maybe these capsules have more Bromelain, maybe the ones I was taking before were just duds. Either way, this pill did not improve my health and well-being, it actively made me feel worse. (ps Why did Amazon ask me to specifically rate this product on "Pain Relief?" It's not supposed to relieve pain in the first place...)

I wish there was a money back guarentee on this product as other supplement companies provide if you’re not satisfied so please beware.

It isn't a miracle cure though. I still have allergies, and runny nose, but it seems to help a bit with skin symptoms and for that I am grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Serene Night

customer_reviews.title: No Covid for me
customer_reviews.text: I use Quercetin with Bromelain as part of the Zelenko Protocol to prevent myself from getting Covid-19. Quercetin like Hydroxychloroquine (which is difficult to find) is a zinc ionophore which means it can help deliver zinc into the human cells which kicks Covid-19 out of your cells or prevents Covid-19 from attacking your cells. I take this product along with zinc and Vitamin C as part of the protocol. Look it up and consult your doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good product but pay attention to the number of pills per serving.
customer_reviews.text: The research on Quercetin is amazing, and I take it three times a day. As far as I know, Quercetin is the only pure flavanoid, which among other things reduces inflammation - which leads to a host of other benefits. One thing that really pisses me off about marketing though is they write 180 pills - but then you see at the back you need two pills per serving. So that means it has half the number of servings as the bottle suggests, and the pills are half as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Rani Lueder

customer_reviews.title: Helps with moderate food histamine intolerance
customer_reviews.text: I have a moderate histamine intolerance to several foods. I take one of these before a meal with high histamine foods and definitely notice an improvement with my symptoms. When I forget to take them I immediately notice my symptoms come on. I just ordered them for my daughter's seasonal allergies and hoping they'll work as well for her.

product_meta.title: Doctor's Best Quercetin Bromelain, Immunity Support, Heart, Joint & Healthy Respiratory System, Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free, Soy Free,180 VC
product_meta.description: Size:180 Count (Pack of 1)Quercetin Bromelain supplies the flavonoid quercetin extracted from seed pods of the Dimorphandra mollis plant. Flavonoids are potent protective nutrients found in many plants and foods. Bromelain is an enzyme derived from pineapple.
feature_bullets: POTENT COMBINATION - Quercetin Bromelain enhances each other's antioxidant and anti-inflammatory potential. Quercetin is a bioflavonoid that has potent antioxidants while bromelain works as protein-digesting enzyme. Bromelain is an enzyme extracted from the stem of the pineapple. Bromelain helps increase your body’s absorption and use of Quercetin.
QUERCETIN BROMELAIN HEALTH BENEFITS - help support immune health, heart health, joint comfort, healthy digestions, respiratory health and inflammatory response supporting overall well-being.

IMMUNE SYSTEM - Quercetin helps ensure appropriate immune response, inhibits formation of free radicals and promotes circulatory health in part by supporting the integrity of small blood vessels. Studies have shown that Quercetin can also support healthy airway function by maintaining a healthy balance of immune system cells within the respiratory system.
DIETARY SUPPLEMENT - High Potency Bromelain 3000 GDU per capsule, has 500 Mg of Quercetin with 250 Mg Bromelain in a serving size of 2 Veggie Capsules

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
